## Instruction  

This document is used to development of the Inited States tonado data.

## Preperation

```{r}
library( tidyverse )
library( stringr )
```

## Load functions

```{r}
 source('D:/R-Projects/Tornadoes/functions/get_file_names.R')
 source('D:/R-Projects/Tornadoes/functions/get_file.R')
```

## Get list of monthly data files

```{r}
files <- get_file_names()
files
```

## Test read_file

```{r}
fname <- file.path( getwd(),
                    "data",
                    files[1])

month <- 
  read_csv( fname ) %>% 
    select( -ABSOLUTE_ROWNUMBER  )
tor
```
## Use Loop to read the rest of the files

```{r}
nof <- length( files )
nof

for( i in 2:nof ){
  fname <- file.path( getwd(),
                      "data",
                      files[i])
  tornadoes <- 
    read_csv( fname ) 
  tornadoes <- bind_rows( tornadoes, month )
  tornadoes <-  month
  
}
```
